1.name: Survival Instinct
1.desc: Immediately restores 20% of the Team Leader's max HP when they take lethal damage. This effect can be triggered only once per battle.

2.name: Proof of Vengeance
2.desc: Increases the Team Leader's DMG by 50% when an allied Mod is defeated. Stacks up to 2 times.

3.name: Way to Wealth
3.desc: Gain 100% more Treasure Coins when choosing the Abandon option.

4.name: Ironwill Hunter
4.desc: Reduces the Mods' DEF by 10% and increases the Healing effects on Mods by 20%.

5.name: Pitiless Scale
5.desc: Increases the ATK of both Mods and enemy units by 20%.

6.name: Private Channels
6.desc: Adds 3 extra items to choose from in the Dimensional Shop.

7.name: Trading Strategy
7.desc: Items in the Dimensional Shop can be refreshed for free twice.

8.name: Mercenary's Wager
8.desc: Grants one extra stage option to select from on the first level.

9.name: Coordinated Combat
9.desc: Team Leader can be switched before battle.

10.name: Lone Wolf
10.desc: Increases the Team Leader's ATK and original max HP by 100% when they are the only Mod in battle.

11.name: Refurb Expert
11.desc: When obtaining an upgradable Memory Treasure, upgrade it 2 times.

12.name: Divine Synergy
12.desc: Triggering the maximum effect of the Gen-zone Bonus only requires 2 Mods of the same Gen-zone.

13.name: Bounty Hunter
13.desc: Gain 50% more Strategy Points from this Dimensional Variable.
